text: Raveen Yasas (born 10 January 1999) is a Sri Lankan cricketer. He made his first-class debut for Chilaw Marians Cricket Club in the 2016–17 Premier League Tournament on 20 January 2017. He made his List A debut for Puttalam District in the 2016–17 Districts One Day Tournament on 22 March 2017. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan cricketers Category:Chilaw Marians Cricket Club cricketers Category:Puttalam District cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Galle
title: Raveen Yasas
